description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Personal Recollections and Observations of General Nelson A. Miles, embracing a brief view of the civil war ... and the story of his Indian campaigns ... Copiously illustrated ... by F. Remington, etc" Author: MILES, Nelson Appleton. Contributor: REMINGTON, Frederic. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9602.i.6.", "British Library DSC MFE/33/07097 *1*" Page: 536 Place of Publishing: Chicago Date of Publishing: 1896 Publisher: Werner Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002491871 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
